title: engum iyarkkai maNam kamazha
language:
Tamil

caraNam 1    engum iyarkkai maNam kamazha EndizhaiyAr uLLangaLUm negizha 
pongum magizha malar pUttuk-kulangum vanattil pullAnkuzhal
gAnam kELAi puNNiyattaik-kAttuk-koNDu mILAi
 caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  kAmavardhani)Aa:S R1 G3 M2 P D1 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D1 P M2 G3 R1 S  eTTi eTTi pArkkudoru kiLLai innishaiyai karkkudoru kiLip-
piLLai taTTi taTTi kuralAl tALamiTTu ADi oru tadingiNatOm 
pODudoru aNip-piLLai inda sangItattil lOkamellAm koLLai
 caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  suraTi)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 P M1 R2 S  bhairavi, mALavi, kAmbhOji, shuddha pancamam, khamAsu, 
dhanyAsi
sahitya:
ranjanam rakti padangaL tillAnA enru pakka vAdyam 
kuyilkaNam pADum adai pArttirundu mayal kaNam Adum
 caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  kApi)Aa:S R2 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N2 D2 N2 P M1 G2 R2 S  vAzhai ilai tennai Olai tAnam vANaccaram maccam kotti 
tAnam Ezhu vaghai kUDal oli IriraNDu vaghai ennum innishai 
vAdi SvarangaLAlum ittaNaiyum kuzhal ninru tAvum
 caraNam 5  			(rAgA:  dEvamanOhari)Aa:S R2 M1 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 N2 P M1 R2 S  cekkac-civanda malar kUTTam kaNDEn shirikkudu vaNDu 
naDamATTam pakkattoru valari cAmarangaL vIshudenna 
pangu koNDu vIshudaDi tOghai anda pankaja kaNNan veTrivAghai
 caraNam 6  			(rAgA:  vasantA)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 M1 G3 R1 S  nAradarin vINai shruti konjum nandiyin maddaLam kUDa 
kenjum Aradan perumai sholli AtravallAr ingu enru AhA enru 
kandaruvar shollum anda Anandattil toNDar kulam vellum
 caraNam 7  			(rAgA:  jayanArAyaNI)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G2 R2 S  rg yajur sAma atharvaNam nirUpikkudu pullAnkuzhal gAnam 
cikkalonrum illAmal upaniSada kUTTamellAm shevikkE
tAvudaDi dArALam inda sEdikkuL irukkudu ErALam
